attributes.action: Ensure that British trained and qualified doctors and nurses are given priotity in Healthcare employment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the current climate of NHS redundancies of experienced staff and failure of newly qualified doctors and nurses to be able to gain employment, does it make any sense to persist with this policy of high overseas recruitment to fill jobs in the UK? 
This is not a question of racism - but one of national practicality. Why continue to recruit from countries that can ill afford to lose specialist professionals, when you have 'home grown' and expensively trained healthcare professionals struggling to find work?
